title: Newly published Datasets from Cirad Dataverse

elements.title: OptiReUse, a decision support tool for wastewater reuse in agriculture irrigation based on Life Cycle Assessment results
elements.contents:
OptiReUse, a decision support tool for wastewater reuse in agriculture irrigation based on Life Cycle Assessment results
Dec 15, 2021 - UPR HORTSYS
Biard, Yannick; Kalboussi, Nesrine, 2021, "OptiReUse, a decision support tool for wastewater reuse in agriculture irrigation based on Life Cycle Assessment results", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/YLP1BA, CIRAD Dataverse, V1
This decision support tool was designed to evaluate the environment efficiency of wastewater reuse for agriculture irrigation among other options. The aim of this decision support tool is to guide the interpretation of LCA results by reducing, gradually, the non-discriminant impa...

elements.title: Monitoring of vegetation after directed fires in the savannas of the leeward coast of la Réunion, Réunion island, 2018-2021
elements.contents:
Monitoring of vegetation after directed fires in the savannas of the leeward coast of la Réunion, Réunion island, 2018-2021
Dec 13, 2021 - UMR PVBMT
Ah-Peng, Claudine, 2021, "Monitoring of vegetation after directed fires in the savannas of the leeward coast of la Réunion, Réunion island, 2018-2021", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/1LB8VY, CIRAD Dataverse, V1, UNF:6:1p0ykECkn3WdnsPRYtMIrg== [fileUNF]
As part of the establishment of controlled fires in the savannas of Cap La Houssaye on Réunion Island, to fight against the shrub invasion of two exotic species Leucaena leucocaphala and Vachellia farnesiana, 40 permanent plots of 2 X 50 m have been installed, named SAV1 to SAV40...

elements.title: Guyafor Data Dictionary
elements.contents:
Guyafor Data Dictionary
Dec 9, 2021 - Guyafor
Jaouen, Gaëlle; Derroire, Géraldine; Dourdain, Aurélie, 2021, "Guyafor Data Dictionary", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/B8FHHA, CIRAD Dataverse, V4
This dictionary contains all the information needed to understand and use the forest censuses data from the Guyafor network.

elements.title: Data and code for the publication entitled: tree growth and mortality of 42 timber species in Central Africa
elements.contents:
Data and code for the publication entitled: tree growth and mortality of 42 timber species in Central Africa
Nov 25, 2021 - Forêts et Sociétés
Ligot, Gauthier; Gourlet-Fleury, Sylvie; Dainou, Kasso; Gillet, Jean-François; Forni, Eric; Rossi, Vivien; Doucet, Jean-Louis, 2021, "Data and code for the publication entitled: tree growth and mortality of 42 timber species in Central Africa", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/EBN15Y, CIRAD Dataverse, V1
Introduction This archive contains all the necessary data and R script to reproduce the results of the manuscript entitled "tree growth and mortality of 42 timber species in Central Africa" submitted to Forest Ecology and Management journal. It includes cleansed data (text files...

elements.title: Data from: Multifunctional soil recovery in the restoration of Brazil’s Atlantic Forest after bauxite mining
elements.contents:
Data from: Multifunctional soil recovery in the restoration of Brazil’s Atlantic Forest after bauxite mining
Nov 12, 2021 - UMR Eco&Sols
Robin, Agnès; Brancalion, Pedro, 2021, "Data from: Multifunctional soil recovery in the restoration of Brazil’s Atlantic Forest after bauxite mining", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/KLZJPI, CIRAD Dataverse, V1, UNF:6:0U4y2n9ETtBHstPh1d6rVA== [fileUNF]
This data displays soil physical and chemical properties and microbial parameters including NGS data describing the diversity of bacterial communities. The study was conducted in 2013 in the private reserve of Retiro Branco and Córrego do Meio farm, in the municipality of Poços d...

UMR Eco&Sols(CIRAD-Centre de coopération internationale en recherche agronomique pour le développement)
Nov 12, 2021
Eco&Sols est une unité mixte de recherche de 70 permanents associant l’INRA, l’IRD, Montpellier SupAgro et le Cirad. Les travaux conduits à Eco&Sols ont pour objectif d’améliorer la compréhension du rôle des organismes du sol et des plantes, ainsi que des interactions entre eux e...

elements.title: TRANSMAT tables data
elements.contents:
TRANSMAT tables data
Nov 10, 2021 - UMR TETIS
Lentschat, Martin; Buche, Patrice; Menut, Luc; Guari, Romane, 2021, "TRANSMAT tables data", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/GCZBC9, CIRAD Dataverse, V2
This dataset presents data obtained from manual and automatic extraction of partial n-Ary relations encountered in table forms. The tables were obtained from on documents available on the Science Direct website. The data are related to permeability n-Ary relations, as defined in...

elements.title: Risque de ruissellement selon des pentes à 7% sur l'île de La Réunion
elements.contents:
Risque de ruissellement selon des pentes à 7% sur l'île de La Réunion
Nov 9, 2021 - UMR TETIS
Degenne, Pascal, 2021, "Risque de ruissellement selon des pentes à 7% sur l'île de La Réunion", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/FSSY6B, CIRAD Dataverse, V1
Estimation d'un risque de ruissellement vers les cours d'eau du Domaine Public Fluvial de l'île de La Réunion selon des pentes supérieures ou égales à 7%. Le calcul de risque de ruissellement est effectué de manière itérative, en partant des cours d'eau et en progressant le long...

elements.title: Tree species inventory in the Cordyla pinnata parkland of Senegal
elements.contents:
Tree species inventory in the Cordyla pinnata parkland of Senegal
Nov 4, 2021 - AIDA
Ndao, Babacar; Leroux, Louise; Diouf, Abdoul Aziz, 2021, "Tree species inventory in the Cordyla pinnata parkland of Senegal", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/RKZ5DN, CIRAD Dataverse, V1
The tree inventory was conducted in the Cordyla pinnata parkland in Senegal, in the region of Nioro du Rip. A field campaign for tree species data collection was carried out in February 2019. It is a weighted stratified sampling of 213 observation sites distributed according to a...

elements.title: Dataset for modelling agronomic and environmental performances of rainfed rice based cropping systems with or without legume in Magadascar
elements.contents:
Dataset for modelling agronomic and environmental performances of rainfed rice based cropping systems with or without legume in Magadascar
Nov 4, 2021 - AIDA
Ripoche Aude; Ranaivoson Lalaina; Autfray Patrice; Muller Bertrand; Randriamandimbisoa Christian; Auzoux Sandrine, 2021, "Dataset for modelling agronomic and environmental performances of rainfed rice based cropping systems with or without legume in Magadascar", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/IVKCBS, CIRAD Dataverse, V1, UNF:6:RDZm4yNOTo334TuxCYrgZA== [fileUNF]
This dataset provide data for calibration and evaluation of the model Stics in the specific context of malagasy higlands with rice cultivar Nerica 4. Data include soil moisture and N initialization, fertilization applied (quality and quantity), cropping practices, data on rice bi...
